game.name: Kingdom Of Choices
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Kingdom of Choices is a Rogue-Lite visual novel game with multiple outcomes. Players must make challenging decisions regarding politics, military, economics, health, religion, and the public as their characters evolve. Send them to rule your kingdom!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Kingdom of Choices is a Rogue-Lite visual novel game with multiple outcomes. Players must make challenging decisions regarding politics, military, economics, health, religion, and the public as their characters evolve. Send them to rule your kingdom!
